title: This could be the only way to tackle corruption in this country
selftext: Found this could be an effective way to get tough on corruption considering we already halfway to fascist democracy and this would keep the AA oligarchy in check.
comments: Vietnam wants to be seen as a non-corrupt country that wants to attract foreign businesses, you know, trying to do good and be accountable, India on the other hand, *coughs*, is the best country on this planet and doesn't need anyone and anything, in fact anything international is either countries being jealous of India or conspiring to sabotage India. This is why greatest of the great leaders of India want to protect its amazing and patriotic capitalists and billionaries who only care about welfare of fellow Indians. It is the duty of our leaders to help them serve the nation by taking up all the contracts and make every Indian proud. So I don't think so this will ever work out in India.
